mapper.select: select ${systemName1} as systemName from status where type='system' and typeid=#{system}
select *,#{name} as name, (select ${name} from status where type='system' and typeid=system)as systemName from workorder where instanceid=#{instanceid} order by id desc
SELECT *, (SELECT ${name} FROM status s WHERE typeid=w.type AND s.type=CAST((SELECT system FROM workorder WHERE id=#{id})AS CHAR))AS typeName FROM worksystem w WHERE woid=#{id} order by type
select id,num,style,system,instanceid,#{name} as name, (select ${name} from status where type='system' and typeid=system)as systemName from workorder w where id=#{id}

num=#{workorder.num},

mapper.select: select month,day,woid,type,id,#{name} as name from scheduling where month=#{month} and instanceid=#{instanceid} group by day,woid,type

select id,name,num, (select name from job where id=p.job)as jobName, (select name from department where id=p.department)as departmentName, (select name from level where id=p.level)as levelName, (select name from worktype where id=p.worktype)as worktypeName, (select num from tag where id=p.tagid)as tagName, (select ${name} from status where type='online' and typeid=(select status from tag where id=p.tagid))as statusName from person p where id in (select personid from scheduling where month=#{month} and day=#{day} and woid=#{woid} and type=#{type})

select *,#{name} as name, (select ${name} from status where type='system' and typeid=system)as systemName from workorder where id in (select woid from scheduling where month=#{month}) and instanceid=#{instanceid}
select id,name, (select name from department where id=p.department)as departmentName from person p where id in (select personid from scheduling where month=#{month} and instanceid=#{instanceid})

SELECT cc.*,${name} AS typeName,s.id FROM (SELECT gg.* FROM (SELECT g.*,workorder.`system` FROM (SELECT personid,`month`,`day`,w.woid,startTIme,endTime,w.`type` FROM scheduling LEFT JOIN worksystem AS w ON (w.woid=scheduling.woid AND w.type=scheduling.type ) WHERE scheduling.personid=#{personid} ) g LEFT JOIN workorder ON workorder.id=g.woid) AS gg) AS cc LEFT JOIN `status` AS s ON (cc.type=s.typeid AND cc.system=s.type)

SELECT cc.*,${name} AS typeName,s.id,#{name} as systemName1 FROM (SELECT gg.* FROM (SELECT g.*,workorder.`system` FROM (SELECT personid,`month`,`day`,w.woid,startTIme,endTime,w.`type` FROM scheduling LEFT JOIN worksystem AS w ON (w.woid=scheduling.woid AND w.type=scheduling.type ) WHERE scheduling.personid=${personid} ) g LEFT JOIN workorder ON workorder.id=g.woid) AS gg) AS cc LEFT JOIN `status` AS s ON (cc.type=s.typeid AND cc.system=s.type) GROUP BY system

select *, (select style from workorder where id=woid)as style, (select system from workorder where id=woid)as system from worksystem where woid in ( select id from workorder where id in (select woid from scheduling where month=#{month}) and instanceid=#{instanceid})
